organic.title: Toys for Tots: Home
organic.snippet: The mission of the US Marine Corps Reserve Toys for Tots Program is to collect new, unwrapped toys during October, November and December each year.

organic.title: Toys for Tots - Cottonwood - vfw7400.org
organic.snippet: Provides toys for the holidays to children in families on low income. Also provides toys to nonprofit organizations for distribution to children in need.
